import React, { useState, useCallback, FC, useMemo } from 'react' import styles from './popupTweet.module.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import avatar from '../../images/png/Bitmap.png' import globe from '../../images/svg/popup/globe-alt.svg' import iconOne from '../../images/svg/popup/image.svg' import music from '../../images/svg/popup/music-speaker.svg' import align from '../../images/svg/popup/align-left.svg' import calendar from '../../images/svg/popup/calendar-two.svg' import coffee from '../../images/svg/popup/coffee.svg' type props = { SetPostNews: any } const PopupTweet: FC = ({ SetPostNews }) => { const [value, setValue] = useState('') const ChangeEvent = useCallback( (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { setValue(e.target.value) }, [setValue] ) const Click = useCallback( (e: React.MouseEvent) => { SetPostNews((prev: any) => [value, ...prev]) setValue('') }, [value, SetPostNews] ) return (
